sentence.Network_en: She had an infallible eye for style.
sentence.Network_cn: 在时尚方面她的眼光错不了。

sentence.Network_en: Although he was experienced, he was not infallible.
sentence.Network_cn: 尽管他经验丰富，却并非不会出错。

PerfectNetExp.abs: infallibility 绝无错误infallible 没有错误的infallibly 绝对无误地
infall 下降infallible 可靠的事物；没有错误的；绝对可靠的；必然的infancy 幼小；初期
张红岩TOEFL ... inevitable adj. 不可避免的，必然的 infallible adj. 必然的，不会错的 infamous adj. 臭名昭著的.
infall 下降infallible 可靠的事物；没有错误的；绝对可靠的；必然的infancy 幼小；初期

list.abs: ...圣经真理无误（Biblical infallibility），又译为圣经无谬论、圣经无谬说，一种基督教神学上的观点。这派的支持者认为，在关于基督信仰以及信仰的实践上，圣经是完全没有错误的，足以作为信仰及生活方式的指引；但是在其他的部份，如历史与科学的部份，则不保证它完全不可能出错。与它相对的，则是圣.
inextricable 不能解决的infallible data 可靠数据infancy 婴儿期
教皇无误论 (Papal infallibility)[quote]原帖由 [i]vistaxp[/i] 于 2009-3-19 10:26 PM 发表 [url=http://www.discuss.com.hk/redi.
...authority or function），包括教宗无误论（papal infallibility）即钦定信条（dogmatic definition）——教宗作为可见的教会领导庄重提.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 15th cent.: from French infaillible or late Latin infallibilis, from in- 'not' + Latin fallere 'deceive'

entry.tran: 不可能错的;不会犯错误的;永无过失的
entry.def: If a person or thing is infallible, they are never wrong.

example.ex: Although he was experienced, he was not infallible...
example.tran: 尽管他经验丰富,却并非不会出错。

example.ex: She had an infallible eye for style.
example.tran: 在时尚方面她的眼光错不了。

sentences.sentence: "the Catholic Church considers the Pope infallible"

auth_sentence.content: It is wrong to presume that he is infallible.
auth_sentence.res_content: It is wrong to presume that he is infallible.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is wrong to presume that he is infallible.

auth_sentence.content: This is not to say peer review is infallible.
auth_sentence.res_content: This is not to say peer review is infallible.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This is not to say peer review is infallible.

auth_sentence.content: He is a leader, but he is not infallible.
auth_sentence.res_content: He is a leader, but he is not infallible.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He is a leader, but he is not infallible.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. =err/deceive,表示"犯错误,欺骗"; 2. = 表示"错,假"

stems_affixes.word_buile: fall犯错误,欺骗+acious有……特征的→有错误的
fall犯错误,欺骗+ible能……的→能犯错的→会犯错的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 绝不会错的,绝对不可靠的
stems_affixes.word_buile: in不+fallible[adj.会犯错的,易犯错的]→adj.绝不会错的,绝对不可靠的
fall犯错误,欺骗+acy性质,状态→n.谬误,错误

means.word_mean: 不会犯错误的, 无过失的

sentences.en: People’s faith in the Emperor was based on the myth that he was infallible.
sentences.cn: 人们效忠君主是基于他永无过失的神话。
我们之中没有人是绝对不会错的。
